title: Postgres IDE in VS Code
author: Dowwie
aiHeadline: Finally, after years of waiting, Microsoft brings us the revolutionary new IDE for Postgres in VS Code—because clearly, we all needed another tool for the same job.

title: John Carmack talk at Upper Bound 2025
author: tosh
aiHeadline: John Carmack, the guy who probably invented the wheel and the internet, gives another mind-blowing talk at Upper Bound 2025—because who doesn't want to hear him talk about the next big thing again?

title: Find Your People
author: jl
aiHeadline: Looking for your tribe? Well, here's a guide on how to 'Find Your People'—because nothing says 'success' like surrounding yourself with people who think exactly like you.

title: Why I no longer have an old-school cert on my HTTPS site
author: mcbain
aiHeadline: Why I No Longer Have an Old-School Cert on My HTTPS Site: Because apparently, being secure is like a fashion trend now, and you have to upgrade every season or you're out of style.

title: MCP is the coming of Web 2.0 2.0
author: freediver
aiHeadline: MCP: The Coming of Web 2.0 2.0—because clearly, Web 2.0 wasn't catchy enough, so let's just add another 2.0 and call it the future.
